name: London Stock Exchange Group
goal: LSEG is the EU's most diversified exchange offering international business access to Europe's capital markets. The Group operates a broad range of international equity, bond and derivatives markets, including: London stock Exchange; Borsa Italiana; MTS-Europe's leading fixed income market; and Turquoise-offering UK and EU derivatives trading. LSEG operates Central Couterparties (CCPs) - CC&G, LCH SA and LCH Ltd.; trade repository - Unavista Ltd; and a Central Securities Depository - Monte Titoli. It also owns the Benchmark administrators FTSE Russell.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market, Taxation
